description: '''Guadalupe Victoria Yol√≠ Raymond''' (23 December 1936 – 29 February 1992), better known as '''La Lupe''', was a Cuban singer of [[bolero]]s, [[guaracha]]s and [[Latin soul]] known for her energetic, sometimes controversial performances. Following the release of her first album in 1961, La Lupe moved from [[Havana]] to [[New York City|New York]] and signed with [[Tico Records]], which marked the beginning of a prolific and successful career in the 1960s and 1970s. She retired in the 1980s due to religious reasons.
